persistence-unit.name: PetClinic
persistence-unit.access-rule: GRANT ACCESS TO Vet vet WHERE vet.credential = CURRENT_USER
GRANT READ ACCESS TO Vet vet
GRANT CREATE READ UPDATE ACCESS TO Pet pet WHERE pet.owner.credential = CURRENT_USER
GRANT READ ACCESS TO Pet pet WHERE EXISTS (SELECT visit FROM Visit visit WHERE visit.pet = pet AND visit.vet.credential = CURRENT_USER)
GRANT ACCESS TO Owner owner WHERE owner.credential = CURRENT_USER
GRANT READ ACCESS TO Owner owner WHERE owner.id IN (SELECT visit.pet.owner.id FROM Visit visit WHERE visit.vet.credential = CURRENT_USER)
GRANT CREATE READ ACCESS TO Visit visit WHERE visit.pet.owner.credential = CURRENT_USER
GRANT READ UPDATE ACCESS TO Visit visit WHERE visit.vet.credential = CURRENT_USER
